Title: Kotarou wa Hitorigurashi
Description:
['The "apartment comedy with laughs and tears" centers on a 4-year-old boy named Kotarou Sat–æou, who moves next door to Shin Karino, an unsuccessful manga artist. Kotarou has no parents and lives alone. Not only does he seem to earn a living, he actually seems more put together than his own strange neighbors.', '
', '
', '
', '
(Source: ANN)']
